prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json

    ],

      "SouthAfrican",
      "Mediterranean"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [

    ],

      "15to30"
    ],

    ],

      "Mild"
    ],

    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Balanced"
    ],
    "EthicsReligious": [],
    "Allergens": []
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Lemon-Oregano Chicken Orzo with Peppadew & Feta",
  "description": "Bright lemon and oregano chicken served over orzo with sweet peppadew peppers, cherry tomatoes, and a light feta crumble. A mild Mediterranean bowl with a South African twist, ready in about 25 minutes.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "1. Bring a large saucepan of water to a boil for the orzo.",
    "2. Halve the cherry tomatoes.",
    "3. Chop the peppadew peppers.",
    "4. Mince the garlic.",
    "5. Zest and juice the lemon.",
    "6. Cut the chicken breast into bite-size strips.",
    "7. In a small bowl, mix oregano, half the lemon zest, a pinch of salt, and pepper with 1 tbsp olive oil to coat the chicken."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "1. Salt the boiling water, add orzo, and cook until just tender; reserve 1/2 cup cooking water, then drain.",
    "2. Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat.",
    "3. Add chicken and cook, stirring, until lightly browned and cooked through, 5–7 minutes; transfer to a plate.",
    "4. In the same pan over medium heat, add garlic and cherry tomatoes; cook until tomatoes soften, 2–3 minutes.",
    "5. Return chicken to the pan, add peppadew peppers, remaining lemon zest, and lemon juice; toss for 1 minute.",
    "6. Add drained orzo to the pan with a splash of reserved cooking water to loosen; season with salt and pepper to taste.",
    "7. Remove from heat and scatter feta over the top; toss gently and serve."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "orzo",
      "quantity": "300 g"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "water",
      "quantity": "3 liters",
      "preparation": "for boiling orzo"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken breast",
      "quantity": "600 g",
      "preparation": "cut into bite-size strips"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cherry tomatoes",
      "quantity": "2 cups",
      "preparation": "halved"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "peppadew peppers",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup",
      "preparation": "chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "3 cloves",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "zest and juice"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "3 tbsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "oregano",
      "quantity": "1 tsp",
      "preparation": "dried"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "feta",
      "quantity": "100 g",
      "preparation": "crumbled"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "1 tsp",
      "preparation": "plus more to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "pepper",
      "quantity": "1/2 tsp",
      "preparation": "plus more to taste"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Mediterranean",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Dairy",
      "Gluten"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Balanced"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "RegionalTwist"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
